issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw: @chapulina We need that estimate working yesterday. Seriously, if that is how we will know world frame, this is way too late in the contest for that to not be available.  With a real robot, you can recover from a bad pose with new sensor updates, but in simulation, if the ihmc controller estimate is off even just a bit, you are going to see Valkyries dropping like flies.  I sure hope someone at OSRF has made Val walk over a network.  I am getting the bad feeling that I was the first one to try it :/
